body.name: Skintimate Coconut Delight Moisturizing Shave gel for Women, 7 Ounce (Pack of 3)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 8 hrs 59 mins
features: MOISTURIZING FORMULA - Our rich, hydrating women's shave gel is formulated with six moisturizers, including shea butter and Vitamin E, to help replenish skin's natural moisture.
INDULGE YOUR SENSES - Coconut Delight shaving cream for women blends cool coconut water and exotic plumeria petals for a refreshing scent that transforms your bathroom into a tropical paradise.
GEL SHAVING LOTION - Moisturizing gel foams into a creamy, luxurious lather for exceptional glide and a close, comfortable shave.
ULTIMATE RAZOR PROTECTION - This shaving gel for women offers unbeatable razor protection against nick, cuts and skin irritation.
FOR DELIGHTFULLY SMOOTH SKIN - For delightfully smooth skin, pair this gel with Skintimate Coconut Delight Disposable Razors.
body.description: Indulge your skin and your senses with a tropical-scented shaving experience. Skintimate Coconut Delight Shave Gel pairs the refreshing scent of coconut and exotic plumeria petals with rich moisturizers for smooth, irresistibly touchable skin. The hydrating formula contains shea butter and Vitamin E, along with coconut water and 6 other moisturizers, to help replenish and protect the skin. Our unique foaming gel lathers into a rich cream that provides a close, comfortable shave and ultimate razor protection against nicks, cuts and skin irritation. Skintimate offers a variety of solutions and scents to meet every woman's shaving needs. Whether your skin is dry, sensitive or somewhere in between, we've got a shave gel and razor that's perfect for you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Skintimate Raspberry Rain Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Coconut Delight Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Skin Therapy Dry Skin Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Vanilla Sugar Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Skin Therapy Sensitive Skin Moisturizing Shave Gel Shave Gel Benefits Formulated with six moisturizers, Vitamin E and olive butter, this foaming shave gel with a luscious scent creates a rich, luxurious lather that aids razor glide for a close, comfortable shave and smooth, show-stopping legs. A hydrating formula with coconut water + six moisturizers, including Vitamin E and olive butter to help replenish and protect the skin with a coconut and exotic plumeria petal fragrance with rich moisturizers for smooth, irresistibly touchable skin Replenish your skin's natural moisture with Skintimate Dry Skin Shave Gel and stop dreading the shave. The lotion-like gel foams into a rich protective lather for a close, comfortable shave and smooth, healthy-looking skin Formulated with six hydrating moisturizers, including shea butter and Vitamin E, with the rich, sweet scent of Vanilla and Sugar Skintimate Sensitive Skin Shave Gel is formulated with extra conditioners and lubricants like aloe and Vitamin E to moisturize and soften skin, and protect against painful nicks and irritation. It even helps replenish your skin’s natural moisture

reviews.reviewText: This shave gel is a nice, general shave gel. It has a great scent. I bought this for my teenage girls and they really like it. Great value

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and quantity
reviews.reviewText: Great quality and quantity for the price .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Three Bottles Included
reviews.reviewText: I figured I would give it a try even though this is not my usual brand because it was quite reasonably priced and I got three bottles for the price I usually spend for one. My house includes five males and two ladies. The young men, for some reason, constantly use the women's shaving gel rather than their manly gel.This works wonders for moisturizing, conditioning, and hydrating dry skin while also providing excellent shaving results. It also contains vitamin E, olive butter, lanolin, and a few additional skin conditioners which leaves the skin feeling smooth and soft.This creates a thick lather and doesn't leave any lumps when I use a throwaway razor. It will last me three times as long, smells good and comes in three the normal-size bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yummm and super soft
reviews.reviewText: The smelllll?? AMAZING. Starts as a gel, turns into a foam and leaves skin super soft after a shave. I am subscribed to this :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pamper Your Skin with a Luxurious Foaming Shave Gel!
reviews.reviewText: This has been my favorite shave gel for a long, long time and I'm finally ordering it now because I sometimes need it faster than I can get out to buy some. Each container is filled with a smooth gel that turns foamy once applied to your skin. I especially enjoy using this on my legs but it seems to work anywhere. It never clogs up my razor and rinses off clean with no residue. To say you will be pampering your skin is probably an understatement. This raspberry gel is heavenly although I seem to remember it being a little more strongly scented in the past. So maybe they've reduced the scent a bit due to sensitivity.~The Rebecca Review

Plain and simple, it does the job. It's REALLY foamy..found that out the hard way. So now I hold the button only a sec.My legs are soft. I don't love the smell, but it's not terrible either and I don't mean that bad way. Everything would be lavender if I had my way..but this works just fine and I'd buy it again. It's also a great deal, which I really appreciate.
Works as well as any other Skintimate shaving gel and smells lovely (if you like the scent of vanilla)
Great vanilla scent. Cruelty free and moisturizing.
I always buy this name brand shaving gel/cream at the stores, but never seen this scent before. Price was great, no issues with the can. The smell is so nice, so sweet. And I love it.
Good gel but came in a huge box. That seemed wasteful
